# Welcome to My Portfolio

This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).

## About This Course
Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.

## Portfolio Structure
- **Weekly Notes:** My learning reflections and key concepts
- **Labs:** Completed assignments and analyses
- **Final Project:** Capstone modeling challenge

## About Me
I am an Associate Professor in the Department of City and Regional Planning at the University of Pennsylvania. I also direct the Master of Urban Spatial Analytics program. This semester, I am teaching MUSA 5080: Public Policy Analytics - we are building portfolios throughout the semester so this is my little demo sampler!
